casebody.data:
HODGES
v.
ROBINSON 2018-1480 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 19, 2018

O'CONNOR, C.J., and O'DONNELL, KENNEDY, FISCHER, DEWINE, and DEGENARO, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On S.Ct.R. 12.04 determination. Cause dismissed. Cause dismissed.

FRENCH, J., dissents and would grant an alternative writ.
